content: he was doing really good until the end, where it turns out that the solution to too much variation is... even more variation

I wouldn't give the guy too many marks as he clearly hasn't familiarised himself with the concepts of FHIR profiling and implementation guides or the fundamentals of extending FHIR. The notion that the market will solve interoperability issues on its own is also a classic example of hope triumphing over experience.
the problem is that market varies... we will solve that with the market. Almost like a fifth columnist...
